items.content_html: ShopEasy is a lightweight yet feature-rich online shopping platform that offers a seamless user experience. Built using React and Context API for state management, this project showcases a clean, intuitive interface where customers can browse products across multiple categories, apply filters, manage their shopping cart, and complete purchases.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
